text: The men's sprint C-1 (canoe single) 1000 metres competition at the 2018 Asian Games was held on 30 August 2018. ==Schedule== All times are Western Indonesia Time (UTC+07:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=100|Event |- | Thursday, 30 August 2018 || 09:10 || bgcolor=ffffcc|Final |} ==Results== ;Legend *DNF — Did not finish {| class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !width=40|Rank !width=250|Athlete !width=80|Time |- | |align=left| |4:05.224 |- | |align=left| |4:05.950 |- | |align=left| |4:06.434 |- |4 |align=left| |4:08.312 |- |5 |align=left| |4:11.232 |- |6 |align=left| |4:44.120 |- |7 |align=left| |5:00.682 |- |— |align=left| |DNF |} ==References== ==External links== *Official website Men's C-1 1000 metres
title: Canoeing at the 2018 Asian Games – Men's C-1 1000 metres
